debug.name: Debug Mode
debug.hint: Client-side setting enabling extended debug logging and data collection

openDelete.name: Unrestricted dismissal
openDelete.hint: Allows players to dismiss unowned tokens

showDismissLabel.name: Show dismiss button label
showDismissLabel.hint: Show the dismiss icon and label, or just the icon on the sheet header.

showRevertLabel.name: Show revert button label
showRevertLabel.hint: Show the revert icon and label, or just the icon on the sheet header.

updateDelay.name: Update delay (ms)
updateDelay.hint: Temporary workaround. Increase this value if you are encountering errors with duplicate placement. Lower this value for faster placement.

alwaysAccept.name: Always accept mutation requests
alwaysAccept.hint: If checked, request dialog will not be shown and blindly accepted.

alwaysAcceptLocal.name: Always accept mutation requests
alwaysAcceptLocal.hint: If checked, request dialog will not be shown and blindly accepted.

dismissButtonScope.name: Dismiss button scope
dismissButtonScope.hint: Determines when the dismiss button is added to actor sheets.

revertButtonBehavior.name: Revert button behavior
revertButtonBehavior.hint: Default action when the button is clicked. Shift+Click will perform the other behavior.

suppressToast.name: Suppress feedback toasts by default
suppressToast.hint: World-level setting controlling the display of toasts during remote operations.

suppressToastLocal.name: Local feedback toast suppression
suppressToastLocal.hint: Client-side setting controlling override of global remote operation feedback toasts.

disablePermCheck.name: Disable Strict Permissions Check
disablePermCheck.hint: If checked, spawning and mutation operations will not check for permissions prior to execution.

debug.dismissPresent: Dismiss button already present. Not adding duplicate.

display.revertAccepted: Revert of mutation [{mName}] for {tName} has been accepted.
display.revertRejected: Revert of mutation [{mName}] for {tName} has been rejected.

error.unknown: Unknown error occured during operation. See console for details.
error.missingPerms: Operation blocked due to missing user permissions: {permList}.
error.noGm: There is no GM available for dismiss request.
error.sheetNoToken: Could not find token associated with this sheet.
error.findActorFail: Could not find world actor named {name}
error.findProtoFail: Could not find proto-token data for {name}
error.noOpenLocation: Could not locate open locations near chosen spawn point. Spawning at chosen point instead.
error.noOwningUserMutate: No owning user online. Mutation request cannot be fulfilled.
error.offlineOwnerBatch: No owner found for some remote batch operations. Not all requests have been processed.
error.noOwningUserRevert: No owning user online. Revert request cannot be fulfilled.
error.incompleteMutateInfo: Overwrite mode used for stack update, but no 'name' field provided.
error.stackLockedOrEmpty: Mutation stack has no changes or is locked for writing. Cannot commit changes to the stack.

stack.noActor: Cannot derive Actor Document from provided Token, TokenDocument, or Actor. Cannot create MutationStack.

badMutate.duplicate: Duplication mutation name detected, "{name}". Stopping mutation.

missing.type: {embeddedName} Add data missing 'type' field. Was this supposed to be an Update instead? Double-check comparison keys and {embeddedName} identifier.

badUpdate.complex: Updates object cannot be serialized or contains non-primitive/object/array properties. Operation aborted.
